meta.title: Muskegon Heights Public School Academy System

meta.content: Muskegon Heights Public School Academy System
Website for Muskegon Heights Public School Academy System

div.p: Click HERE for this week's home learning plans.

Our entire school team misses our students and families! We have been working hard to plan for continued learning for each of our students. This work includes helping to make sure all students have access to the internet.We are collecting information needed to begin distributing devices to our students. One survey is required per student. We can not provide a device unless this survey is completed.

Beginning Wednesday, April 22, 2020, we will be moving to a once per week delivery to all children under 18 and children 18-26 with an IEP. Please register online or call Daphne at 231-830-3703 to complete the registration.
Find your weekly learning plans here. You can also find a link on the home page in the News section under Weekly Learning Plans - Home Learning Resources .

Kids’ Food Basket is a nonprofit organization attacking childhood hunger to help young people learn and be well.
Your child's success depends on it!
Muskegon Area Promise Scholarships will fund an associate’s degree, license or certificate program at Muskegon Community College or Baker College of Muskegon.

div.p: Our mission is to provide a comprehensive, equitable system where all stakeholders work collaboratively to hold the success of each and every learner as the highest priority. We are committed to a climate that embraces student values, beliefs, backgrounds, and identity in a safe, welcoming and joyful environment. Through relentless urgency, we empower students with the academic and non-academic supports they deserve to reach their potential. Our scholars define their own success realizing they are the key to a future of meaningful options.
Click here for our Partnership Agreement with the Michigan Department of Education.
Click here to learn about our 18 month check in on the Partnership Agreement with the Michigan Department of Education and our stakeholders.
Please find our Web Accessibility Policies located under the 'About Us' page. To obtain copies of these policies please visit the office at MHA, 2441 Sanford, Muskegon Heights, MI 49444.
